scriptedContentFragment.name: Arm - Support CTA
scriptedContentFragment.description: Provides a call to action for Arm Support entitled members
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
With a support entitlement you can also get direct access to our team of highly-qualified Arm experts 24-hours a day

Open a support case
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Arm_Support_CTA_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> </propertyGroup>
